Uses of Interface
net.threescale.api.cache.ApiCache

  • Packages that use ApiCache 
    Package Description
    net.threescale.api
    This API is used to encapsulate the communication with the 3scale backend server for validating and reporting transactions between the user and the provider of a service.
    net.threescale.api.cache  
    net.threescale.api.v2
    This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend.

    • Uses of ApiCache in net.threescale.api

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2ApiWithCache(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender, ApiCache cache)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object with a user specified cache and http sender.

    • Uses of ApiCache in net.threescale.api.cache

      Classes in net.threescale.api.cache that implement ApiCache 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CacheImplCommon
      Base class for cache classes.
      class  ConfiguredCacheImpl
      A cache that is configured from a file.
      class  DefaultCacheImpl
      A cache that uses the default xml file (etc/default.xml).
      class  NullCacheImpl
      Null Cache that sends everything straight to the server.
